# vDSP_zvphasD

**Function**

Calculates the double-precision element-wise phase values, in radians, of the supplied complex vector using the specified stride.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_zvphasD(const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, double * __C, vDSP_Stride __IC, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_zvphas], except for the types of vectors `A` and `C`.

## Single-Vector Phase Computation

- **vDSP_zvphas**: Calculates the single-precision element-wise phase values, in radians, of the supplied complex vector using the specified stride.
